author: jstrachan
msg: added a few more things to the todo list

author: jstrachan
msg: Patched bug in XML tags that <x:forEach> wasn't properly setting the XPath context.
We now have some early JUnit tests written in Jelly itself.
Could do with some JUnit tags of the form...

author: jstrachan
msg: Fixed dodgy line endings so that they now all use the regular LF. I think these were incorrectly caused by me by using a combination of cygwin on NT and Forte to write the code in the first place.

author: jstrachan
msg: Improved the JSTL support of the XML tags
Also added some ObjectBridge tags for working with persistent beans and loading OJB based data stores.
Started to add some Jelly-based unit testing. Though some assert and assertEquals tags should be useful.

author: jstrachan
msg: Updated the Tag invocation protocol to be very close to JSP1.3; though taking an XMLOutput parameter to denote XML operations, and using a JellyContext rather than a PageContext. Also added a <c:new var="foo" className="java.util.List"/> extension tag.
